title: New Block Title
body: Michael Porter identified three main ways a business can gain a competitive advantage — these are called generic strategies because they can be applied across industries and business types.

title: New Block Title
body: Geert Hofstede developed a framework to help understand how national cultures influence values, behaviours, and business practices. It’s especially useful in international business contexts, like Myt’s global operations.

body:
Also called slack, this is the amount of time a task can be delayed without delaying the entire project.

It is calculated by


EST of the next task - Duration - EST of task

title: New Block Title
displayTitle: Finding the Critical Path
body: The Critical Path is the tasks that cannot be delayed without delaying the entire project.

title: New Block Title
displayTitle: Card Drop Activity

title: New Block Title
displayTitle: Deciding on a Pricing Strategy
body:
Myt PLC is reassessing the pricing strategy for its Myt Max Energy drink to improve profitability in a competitive market.


  • Current selling price: $2.50

  • Variable cost per unit: $1.50

  • Fixed costs: $100,000

  • Current monthly units sold: 50,000

  • Net profit: $25,000




They have two proposed options. 


  • Option 1: Decrease the price to $2.00

  • Option 2: Increase the price to $3.00



What should Myt do?
